articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Greetings to Syrian President
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Greetings to Syrian President
Pyongyang, November 16 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, Wednesday sent a message of greeting to Bashar Al-Assad, president of the Syrian Arab Republic.
					 In the message Kim Jong Un extended the warmest congratulations to the Syrian president, friendly government and people of Syria on the anniversary of the corrective movement in Syria.
					
					 For the past 46 years since the corrective movement the Syrian government and people have gained a lot of achievements in the work for protecting sovereignty of the country and building a new prosperous society under the correct leadership of HE Hafez Al-Assad and Bashar Al-Assad, the message said.
					
					 Reaffirming the full support and solidarity of the DPRK to the righteous cause of the Syrian people, it wished the Syrian president good health and bigger successes in his responsible work.

articles.title: DPRK Women Greet 6th DWUK Congress with Labor Feats
articles.content:
DPRK Women Greet 6th DWUK Congress with Labor Feats
Pyongyang, November 16 (KCNA) -- All members of the Democratic Women's Union of Korea (DWUK) have worked hard to greet the 6th DWUK Congress with labor feats.
					 In response to the call of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea, those in flood-hit North Hamgyong Province turned out in a drive to recover from flood damage.
					
					 They played an active role in recovering the disaster areas and supplied 30,000 pieces of tools, tens of thousands of daily necessities and tens of tons of essential foodstuff to the recovery effort.
					
					 Women's union members in South Hwanghae Province provided 10 tons of scrap cast iron and aluminum to the Haeju Tractor Accessory Parts Factory and farm machine stations in nine counties.
					
					 Those in North Hwanghae and North Phyongan provinces also rendered sincere assistance to the repair of diesel locomotive and gathered a lot of idle materials to help increase the production at industrial establishments.
					
					 Meanwhile, more than 22,000 women's union members throughout the country volunteered this year to work feats in light industrial, agricultural and other economic sectors.

articles.title: Mother's Day Marked in DPRK
articles.content:
Mother's Day Marked in DPRK
Pyongyang, November 16 (KCNA) -- Service personnel and people of the DPRK significantly marked the Mother's Day.
					 Mothers across the country the plaza of the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun, sacred temple of Juche, where President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il lie in state, and the statues and portraits of the smiling great leaders on Mansu Hill and in their residential quarters before laying floral baskets, bouquets and flowers before the statues and portraits and paying tribute to the great leaders.
					
					 They also visited statues of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk at the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong and in Kim Jong Suk County and Hoeryong City to recall her revolutionary career.
					
					 Art performances were given in Pyongyang, provinces, cities and counties.
					
					 The revolutionary opera "Victory of the Revolution Is in Sight" was given at the Pyongyang Grand Theatre.
					
					 Musical dance and poem "'Arirang' Story" was given at the Ponghwa Art Theatre, drama "Blood Vessel" at the National Theatre, circus performance and magic performance at the Pyongyang Circus Theater and the National Circus.
					
					 Artistes in North Phyongan, South Hwanghae, North Hwanghae and Jagang provinces and other places gave performances.
					
					 Women scientists and teachers living in apartment houses for educators of Kim Il Sung University, Mirae Scientists Street and Unha Scientists Street were very pleased to receive congratulatory bouquets from their children and disciples.
					
					 Greeting cards from sons and daughters at posts defending the country and stirring socialist construction sites were conveyed to their mothers.
					
					 Okryu Restaurant, Chongryu Restaurant and other public catering establishments across the country warmly served mothers.

articles.title: Samjiyon Band of Mansudae Art Troupe Performs on Mother's Day
articles.content:
Samjiyon Band of Mansudae Art Troupe Performs on Mother's Day
Pyongyang, November 16 (KCNA) -- The Samjiyon Band of the Mansudae Art Troupe gave a performance at the April 25 House of Culture on Wednesday, the Mother's Day.
					 It was enjoyed by Kim Yong Nam, Choe Ryong Hae and other senior officials of the party and state, participants in the 6th Sixth Congress of the Democratic Women's Union of Korea (DWUK), women of distinguished services, female innovators, exemplary mothers, members of the DWUK and female officials.
					
					 When "Song in Praise of Women in Songun Era" was played, the artistes appeared on the stage and congratulated the entire audience marking the Mother's Day.
					
					 Put on the stage were music "Great Love of the Mother", female solo "Unforgettable Echoes over Lagoon Samil", music for cello ensemble "My Mother", immortal famous song, a collection of world famous songs, etc.
					
					 The performers sang high praises of the noble lives and immortal feats of the great mothers of Korea who held the sun of the nation and great sages of revolution in high esteem and succeeded to the blood of Mangyongdae and Paektu and devoted all their wisdom and energies to the country, people and future of revolution.
					
					 Numbers representing the great favors bestowed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il pleased the audience.
					
					 Music reflecting greetings of sons and daughters extending the mothers resounded far and wide.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Blasts Park and "Saenuri Party" for Trying to Seek Way out
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Blasts Park and "Saenuri Party" for Trying to Seek Way out
Pyongyang, November 16 (KCNA) -- Traitor Park Geun Hye breathing her last after the revelation of the hideous political scandal is trying to seek a way out by putting forward the "Saenuri Party".
					 Gentries of the "Saenuri Party" are trying to calm down the angry public with such excuses as "prompt and thorough-going probe into the truth" and claiming that "prevention of the suspension of state administration is a priority". They are employing all sorts of sleight of hand while crying out for "listening to various voices with attention" and "supra-partisan cooperation from opposition parties".
					
					 This is nothing but a crafty trick to help Park escape impeachment and get rid of abyss of total ruin by deceiving the enraged public and putting under control the situation by coaxing the opposition parties under the cloak of "keeping the administration afloat".
					
					 But with no rhetoric can Park and the "Saenuri Party" cover up their crimes nor can they escape a stern punishment by the public.
					
					 Shaman Choe Sun Sil manipulated Park as a puppet and monopolized the south Korean politics. This shocking fact has touched off astonishment and anger of the broad segment of the people.
					
					 The public also turned their back on the "Saenuri Party", a despicable group of accomplices as it acted a guard and shield of Chongwadae while conniving at the arbitrary practices of Park and Choe even though it was well aware of the shaman's manipulation of politics.
					
					 The south Koreans are demanding impeachment of Park and dissolution of the "Saenuri Party" irrespective of affiliation, political view, religious belief, gender, age, residence, while becoming increasingly vocal holding that "not only Choe but also Park and the 'Saenuri Party' which helped her should be accountable for the scandal".
					
					 The third all-people action "Let us gather, get angered and bring down Park" which was held across south Korea on Nov. 12 showed the public mindset never to pardon the dictatorial rule, corrupt politics.
					
					 Despite the gravity of the situation, Park and gentries of the "Saenuri Party" are running the whole gamut of gimmicks to escape impeachment and maintain their position as a ruling party, far from lending an ear to the public voice.
					
					 While trying to direct the focus of the scandal to Choe with such talk as "acceptance of special investigation," they are trumpeting about "operation of Trump emergency system" and "supra-partisan counteraction for settling security and economic issues" in a bid to use even the U.S. presidential election as an emergency measure.
					
					 Park and gentries of the "Saenuri Party" are still resorting to dirty farce even today when they are sentenced to death by the public. This is an open challenge to the public and little short of adding to the crimes it has already committed.
					
					 But no power can quell the public mindset.
					
					 Park and the "Saenuri Party" are bound to get buried for ever by the strong waves of resistance by the united south Koreans for their crimes against the people and the nation.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Denounces Park Geun Hye Group's Taking Issue with Proper Media Reports in DPRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Denounces Park Geun Hye Group's Taking Issue with Proper Media Reports in DPRK
Pyongyang, November 16 (KCNA) -- Now the south Korean people from all walks of life fiercely launch anti-regime actions in high dudgeon across south Korea over the "Park Geun Hye-Choe Sun Sil scandal".
					 The DPRK reports this news through media, but the puppet minister of Unification of south Korea groundlessly took issue with this, talking about "interference in internal affairs."
					
					 This is nothing but the disgraceful behavior of the group of traitors obsessed with chronic evil practice to slander the fellow countrymen in the north, Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says in a commentary.
					
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 The extra-large scandal of traitor Park Geun Hye unprecedented in history has become the breaking news for media around the world and this is the comment of the world media on the poor plight of Park driven to the quagmire for her despicable criminal acts.
					
					 Media in the DPRK objectively reported about the present situation of south Korea related to the "Park Geun Hye-Choe Sun Sil scandal".
					
					 The Park's group is taking issue with the proper report by media of the DPRK while branding it as "inference in internal affairs". This reminds the people of a rabid dog barking until the moment of death.
					
					 The puppet group of traitors has so far resorted to the confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north and the moves for a war against the north, persistently slandering the ideology and social system of the DPRK since they came to power. However, they vociferate about "interference in internal affairs of south Korea" to take issue with the north, feigning ignorance of their acts. It is like a thief crying "stop thief!"
					
					 They should feel shame.
					
					 Before pulling up the DPRK, the Park Geun Hye group should make an apology before the people for the crimes of bringing the extreme political chaos and catastrophe to south Korea and immediately step down as demanded by the people of different social standings.

articles.title: DPRK Papers Congratulate Korean Mothers on Mother's Day
articles.content:
DPRK Papers Congratulate Korean Mothers on Mother's Day
Pyongyang, November 16 (KCNA) -- DPRK papers on Wednesday deal with the facts that tens of millions of sons and daughters across the country are congratulating their mothers on Mother's Day from their posts for defending the country and at worksites and home.
					 Rodong Sinmun editorially said that the patriotic and faithful holy traces of mothers, who have always shared their destinies with the party with a strong will despite hardship and trials of every description, are recorded in the long history of the Korean revolution.
					
					 The Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people are proud of the fact that the respectable Korean mothers have fulfilled the duties with which they are charged before the country and the nation in the times, always being loyal to the cause of the party.
					
					 Our mothers are also respectable educators who bring up their children to be the successors to revolution and pillars of building a thriving nation.
					
					 The Paektusan revolutionary strong army is in the van of the struggle to be loyal to the Songun leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The young people also created new legendary tales about heroic youth and performed feats in all theatres of building scientifically and technically strong country, economic power and highly civilized nation.
					
					 All these praiseworthy successes are thanks to the devotion of mothers.
					
					 Our mothers are also patriots who make positive contributions to the building of a strong socialist country with patriotism.
					
					 The mothers of Korea regard socialism as their life and lives.
					
					 The mothers always devote themselves to the society and the collective and comrades. They are now giving fuller play to such clean and noble moral traits.
					
					 The laughs and devotion of mothers and other women serve as the strength of the collective and also nutriment of vitality of society.
					
					 The entire women and mothers should give a steady continuity to the history and tradition of loyalty by which they trusted only the party and the leaders and were faithful to them, being proud of having been blessed with illustrious leaders.
					
					 Minju Joson also in an editorial said that thanks to Kim Jong Un, the world's strongest country, where the happiness of our mothers and the people come into full bloom, will be built on our land without fail.

articles.title: Anti-Park Geun Hye Struggle Continues in S. Korea
articles.content:
Anti-Park Geun Hye Struggle Continues in S. Korea
Pyongyang, November 16 (KCNA) -- South Korean people from all walks of life continue the struggle in demand of the resignation of traitor Park Geun Hye, according to reports from Seoul.
					The People's Emergency Action to Force the Park Geun Hye Regime to Step down grouping more than 1,550 civic and social organizations declared on Nov. 13 that they would escalate the one-million candlelight action on Nov. 12 to all parts of south Korea saying that no power could win the people.
					
					 It called for expanding the candlelight action to more than 100 regions, launching large-scale action on Nov. 19 and all citizens' meeting in Seoul on Nov. 26 if Park Geun Hye does not step down by then.
					
					 The south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions on Nov. 14 called a press conference in demand of the unconditional resignation of Park and called upon the opposition parties to more actively join in the people's resistance for the resignation of the "government".
					
					 The Citizens Solidarity for Democratic Society, Bar Association for Democratic Society and other organizations called a press conference outside the building of the "National Federation of Businessmen" on the same day.
					
					 Students, citizens, disabled people and opposition party members are escalating the "village candlelight" action.
					
					 The Taejon Movement Headquarters for Defending Democracy of south Korea launched a candlelight action in demand of the resignation of Park Geun Hye in Taejon on Nov. 14.

articles.title: S. Korean Farmers Stage Tractor and Car Protest March
articles.content:
S. Korean Farmers Stage Tractor and Car Protest March
Pyongyang, November 16 (KCNA) -- The south Korean online paper "Voice of People" said that the struggle group of the south Korean Federation of Peasants Associations left for Seoul by tractor and car on Nov. 15.
					 The group, consisting of those from the eastern area and those from the western area, launched the tractor and car march.
					
					 It is reported that the two groups will tour across south Korea and meet in Seoul on Nov. 25 and take part in the general protest to be held the next day.

articles.title: S. Korean Opposition Parties Demand Park Geun Hye Be Summoned and Investigated as Criminal Suspect
articles.content:
S. Korean Opposition Parties Demand Park Geun Hye Be Summoned and Investigated as Criminal Suspect
Pyongyang, November 16 (KCNA) -- The opposition parties are demanding that Park Geun Hye be summoned and investigated as a criminal suspect, according to south Korean media including Newsis.
					 70 lawmakers from the Minju Party of south Korea called a press conference in front of the Seoul Central District Prosecutor's Office on Nov. 14.
					
					 In the interview they said that it was disclosed through a criminal investigation of the scandal that what Park denied was all true.
					
					 The chief spokesman for the party also called a press conference on the same day at which he blasted Park for making Choe Sun Sil profit by abusing her office.

articles.title: S. Korean Citizen Posts Articles Praising DPRK on Internet Website
articles.content:
S. Korean Resident Posts Articles Praising DPRK on Internet Website
Pyongyang, November 16 (KCNA) -- It was reported that a south Korean resident posted on internet website articles praising the DPRK, according to the south Korean News 1.
					 He opened a website in June 2009 and since then posted 207 articles praising the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu and the DPRK and introducing Songun politics till November last year.
					
					 In the articles in August 2009 he said about the great international political might of the north and its majestic diplomatic prestige.
					
					 He said south Korea is the military colony of the U.S. and the north will bring the U.S. to its knees and achieve withdrawal of the U.S. troops and reunification by federal formula with its strong military power and diplomacy.

articles.title: Quakes Hit South Chungchong Province, S. Korea
articles.content:
Quakes Hit South Chungchong Province, S. Korea
Pyongyang, November 16 (KCNA) -- A 3.5-magnitude earthquake struck Boryong City, South Chungchong Province of south Korea on Nov. 13, according to the south Korean KBS.
					 The epicenter was in the outskirts of the city and the quake jolted buildings.
					
					 The 3.1-magnitude quake rattled the province in February, too.

articles.title: Int'l Kothongryon Magazine "Thongil" Sept.-Oct. Issue Released
articles.content:
Int'l Kothongryon Magazine "Thongil" Sept.-Oct. Issue Released
Pyongyang, November 16 (KCNA) -- The International United Confederation of Koreans (International Kothongryon) made public the September-October issue of its monthly magazine Thongil.
					 It carried photo-accompanying news that supreme leader Kim Jong Un gave field guidance to the Taedonggang Syringe Factory, he had a photo session with those who contributed to the successful explosion test of nuclear warhead, etc.
					
					 It also carried news that senior leading officials of the party, state and army visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun to pay homage to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on the 68th founding anniversary of the DPRK and the national meeting in celebration of the anniversary took place. 
					
					 Seen in the magazine were the statements of the spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry and the spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of the Country and the memorandum of the Institute of International Studies issued over the grave situation created on the Korean peninsula owing to the anti-DPRK confrontation moves of the U.S. and the south Korean authorities. 
					
					 It carried photo-accompanying news that whole Party, service personnel and people unanimously turned out in the drive for recovering from the flood damage in the northern part of North Hamgyong Province of the DPRK together with an appeal of the Workers' Party of Korea Central Committee to all the Party members, service personnel and people calling for directing all the efforts to the front for rehabilitation.

articles.title: Russian Expert Comments on DPRK's Line
articles.content:
Russian Expert Comments on DPRK's Line
Pyongyang, November 16 (KCNA) -- The British internet news Global Headlines recently carried an article about Russian expert's comment on the DPRK's line of simultaneously pushing forward the two fronts.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The chief of the Strategic Center for Asia of the Economic Institute of the Russian Academy of Sciences said the DPRK's line of simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force has proven effective.
					
					 Despite sanctions and pressure, the DPRK had access to powerful nuclear deterrent and performed innovative successes in the economic construction.
					
					 The economy of the DPRK is developing as days go by. This is because the DPRK has put many efforts into economic construction. Sanctions will not help settle the Korean issue. Moreover, forcing the DPRK to surrender won't make sense.

articles.title: British Bodies Blast U.S.-South Korea War Drills against DPRK
articles.content:
British Bodies Blast U.S.-South Korea War Drills against DPRK
Pyongyang, November 16 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, the Korean Friendship Association UK and the British preparatory committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu recently released a joint statement.
					 Saying the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces are ceaselessly staging war drills against the DPRK on the Korean peninsula, the statement noted:
					
					 What is urgently required on the peninsula is detente and south Korean regime's retraction of hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 The south Korean Park Geun Hye regime finding itself in the worst crisis is becoming ever more desperate in breeding plots against the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK, the country of Juche, is standing on the forefront of confrontation between socialism and imperialism, independence and dominationism.
					
					 The north-targeted war drills are part of the moves to stifle Korean-style socialism, bring down the only socialist country in the world and stamp out the revolutionary forces standing against imperialism.
					
					 All progressive people and followers of the Juche idea and the Songun idea should unanimously support the DPRK.
					
					 The followers of the Juche idea and the Songun idea in Britain resolutely denounce the war drills against the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on Nigerian Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on Nigerian Website
Pyongyang, November 16 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's letter "The Duty of the Working Class of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il for the Times and the Tasks Facing Trade Union Organizations" to those attending the Seventh Congress of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea (GFTUK) was posted on the website of the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism on Nov. 10.
					 The letter sent to participants of the congress of GFTUK on Oct. 25, Juche 105 (2016) clarifies the tasks and ways for the heroic working class of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il to become an engine steering the ranks of the general advance and a model of society by holding aloft the banner of modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and thus accelerate the building of a socialist power.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un felicita a Presidente sirio
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un felicita a Presidente sirio
Pyongyang, 16 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, remitio hoy un mensaje de felicitacion a Bashar al-Assad, Presidente de la Republica Arabe de Siria.
					La misiva senala como sigue:
					
					Con motivo del dia conmemorativo del Movimiento de Rectificacion de Siria, extiendo la calurosa felicitacion a Vd., y al gobierno y pueblo de vuestro pais amistoso.
					
					Durante 46 anos pasados posteriores al Movimiento de Rectificacion, el gobierno y el pueblo de vuestro pais obtuvieron muchos exitos en la lucha por defender la soberania del pais y construir la nueva sociedad prospera bajo la correcta direccion de Su Excelencia Hafez Al-Assad y Vd. 
					
					Aprovecho esta oportunidad para reafirmar nuestro apoyo total y solidaridad con la justa causa del pueblo arabe sirio y formular votos por la buena salud de Vd., y mayores exitos en sus trabajos responsables.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita al electo presidente de Moldava
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita al electo presidente de Moldava
Pyongyang, 16 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Kim Yong Nam, presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, envio ayer un mensaje de felicitacion a Igor Dodon, electo como presidente de la Republica de Moldava.
					En su misiva, el remitente expuso su conviccion de que las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre la RPDC y la Republica de Moldava se desarrollaran favorablemente conforme a los deseos de los pueblos de dos paises y formulo votos por los exitos en los trabajos del destinatario por la prosperidad del pais.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita al electo presidente de Bulgaria
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita al electo presidente de Bulgaria
Pyongyang, 16 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Kim Yong Nam, presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, envio el dia 15 un mensaje de felicitacion a Rumen Radev, electo como presidente de la Republica de Bulgaria.
					En su misiva, el remitente expuso la conviccion de que las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre dos paises se desarrollaran mas de acuerdo con los intereses mutuos y formulo votos por los exitos en las responsabilidades del destinatario para la prosperidad de Bulgaria.

articles.title: Ofrecida funcion artistica de Banda Samjiyon de Conjunto Artistico Mansudae
articles.content:
Ofrecida funcion artistica de Banda Samjiyon de Conjunto Artistico Mansudae
Pyongyang, 16 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 16 en la Casa Cultural 25 de Abril la funcion artistica de la Banda Samjiyon del Conjunto Artistico Mansudae dedicada al Dia de la Madre.
					La presenciaron Kim Yong Nam, Choe Ryong Hae y otros cuadros directivos del partido y el Estado, las participantes en el VI Congreso de la Union de Mujeres Democraticas de Corea, las ameritadas y las innovadoras de los sectores de educacion, ciencia, prensa e informacion, literatura y arte, deporte y las ramas dificiles, las madres ejemplares, las gremiales y las funcionarias de la UMDC de esta capital.
					
					En medio de que se interpretaba la cancion "Himno a la mujer de la epoca del Songun", los artistas salieron a la escena y felicitaron a toda la audiencia que acoge el Dia de la Madre. 
					
					Se presentaron en la escena varias piezas tales como la musica "El amor de gran madre", el solo femenino "Inolvidables ecos en el lago Samil", la musica para el concierto de violonchelo "Mi madre", imperecedera obra maestra, y la coleccion de musicas famosas del mundo. 
					
					Los ejecutantes cantaron en tono patetico la vida valiosa y las proezas imperecederas de las grandes madres de Corea quienes dieron continuidad al linaje de Mangyongdae y del Paektu y se abnegaron por la patria, el pueblo y el futuro de la revolucion. 
					
					Conmovieron tanto a los espectadores las piezas que cantaron la gran benevolencia del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					Las canciones tales como "Muchacha en el columpio", "Mi esposa" y "Que se vaya el tiempo" llevaron al climax el ambiente de la funcion.

articles.title: No hay el poder que gane la voluntad del pueblo, comentario de ACNC
articles.content:
No hay el poder que gane la voluntad del pueblo, comentario de ACNC
Pyongyang, 16 de noviembre (ACNC) -- La traidora Park Geun-hye, quien se halla en la agonia debido al escandalo politico sin precedentes, esta desesperada para buscar la salvacion con la ayuda del Partido Saenuri.
					Los compinches de esa agrupacion tratan de calmar la opinion publica con expresiones como el "esclarecimiento rapido y consecuente de la verdad" y "lo prioritario es prevenir la suspension de la administracion estatal".
					
					Asimismo, hablan de "escuchar con seriedad las opiniones diferentes" y la "cooperacion suprapartidista de los partidos opositores".
					
					Asi ellos tratan de salvar a Park Geun-hye a punto de ser dimitida y salir del abismo de arruinamiento general al enganar a la indignada opinion publica bajo el pretexto de "remediar los asuntos estatales" y reparar la situacion embaucando a los partidos opositores.
					
					Pero, Park y sus partidarios del partido gobernante no pueden encubrir con ninguna artimana sus crimenes ni evitar la sentencia severa del pueblo.
					
					Los surcoreanos de diferentes sectores estan pasmados e indignados por el hecho de que la simple bruja Choe Sun Sil vino controlando a sus caprichos el circulo politico del Sur de Corea siendo titiritera de Park.
					
					Dan espaldas al Partido Saenuri que si bien conocia esa politica de brujeria, actuo como guardia y escudo de Chongwadae haciendo vista gorda de las arbitrariedades de Park y Choe.
					
					Por esta razon, todos ellos exigen, sin distingos de profesiones, criterios politicos, religiones, sexos, edades y regiones de residencia, la dimision de Park y la disolucion del Partido Saenuri insistiendo en que "la responsabilidad del incidente no recae sobre la figura individual de Choe Sun Sil sino sobre Park Geun-hye y su colaborador Partido Saenuri".
					
					La 3a lucha de todo el pueblo "Reunamos con indignacion. Abajo Park Geun-hye", que tuvo lugar simultaneamente el dia 12 en todo el territorio surcoreano, ha sido una prueba evidente de la voluntad del pueblo de no perdonar la dictadura y las politicas corruptas.
					
					En lugar de escuchar la opinion publica, la traidora y sus partidarios del Partido Saenuri recurren a todas las artimanas para frenar la dimision y mantener la posicion de partido gobernante.
					
					Hablando de "aceptar la inspeccion especial", tratan de trasladar el enfoque del incidente a Choe Sun Sil.
					
					Ademas, quieren utilizar como escapatoria hasta el resultado de elecciones presidenciales de EE.UU. haciendo referencia a la "operacion del sistema de emergencia de Trump" y "contramedidas suprapartidistas para el problema de seguridad y economia".
					
					No hay el poder que gane la voluntad del pueblo.
					
					Por sus crimenes antipopulares y antinacionales, Park y sus compinches seran sepultados ante la voragine de protestas de la poblacion surcoreana unida.

articles.title: En el Sur de Corea continua la lucha en demanda del retiro de Park Geun-hye
articles.content:
En el Sur de Corea continua la lucha en demanda del retiro de Park Geun-hye
Pyongyang, 16 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Segun los medios de prensa surcoreanos, los habitantes de distintos sectores del Sur de Corea siguen desarrollando la lucha por la retirada de la traidora Park Geun-hye.
					La Accion Emergente del Pueblo por el Retiro del "Poder" de Park Geun-hye, organizacion solidaria compuesta por mas de 1550 entidades civiles y sociales, declaro el dia 13 ampliar a toda la region surcoreana la lucha de mas de un millon de velas desarrollada el dia 12 insistiendo en que ningun poder puede vencer a la poblacion.
					
					Continuo que efectuara el dia 19 una gran protesta extendiendo la accion de velas a mas de 100 zonas. Y llamo a los habitantes de todo el territorio surcoreano a volver a reunirse el dia 26 en Seul si la traidora no se retira hasta ese dia.
					
					Advirtio que Park se enfrentara con la mayor manifestacion de velas y protesta de la poblacion.
					
					El mismo dia, tuvo lugar un acto de recordacion ante la tumba del martir Jon Thae Il en la comuna de Masoku de la provincia de Kyonggi del Sur de Corea bajo auspicios de la Fundacion Jon Thae Il.
					
					El dia 14, la Confederacion de Sindicatos Coreanos sostuvo una entrevista de prensa en que demando la retirara incondicional de Park y la incorporacion activa de los partidos en oposicion en la lucha del pueblo por expulsarla del "poder".
					
					Tambien, la Participacion Solidaria de Ciudadanos por la Sociedad Democratica, la Union de Abogados por una Sociedad Democratica y otras entidades concedieron una rueda de prensa ante el edificio de la "Federacion Nacional de Empresarios" (Jongyongryon).
					
					Por otra parte, se amplian las luchas de diversos tipos entre otras la protesta con velas, la recogida de firmas en las entradas del metro y las declaraciones sobre la situacion.
					
					Se efectuan todos los dias por la noche en diferentes localidades los mitines con velas por auspicios de los habitantes y entidades pequenas.
					
					Con el paso de los dias, toman mayor dimension las "protestas con velas en poblados" en que participan los estudiantes, ciudadanos, miembros de las entidades de discapacitados y de los partidos de oposicion.
					
					La Direccion del Movimiento en Taejon por la Defensa de la Democracia del Sur de Corea desplego el dia 14 en Taejon la lucha con velas en demanda de la dimision de la gobernadora surcoreana.
